subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When he competes in the Coca-Cola 600 on Sunday, Bill Elliott will join the  list of acclaimed drivers who have raced in the No. 21 Ford owned by the Wood Brothers.
snippet: When he competes in the Coca-Cola 600 on Sunday, Bill Elliott will join the  list of acclaimed drivers who have raced in the No. 21 Ford owned by the Wood Brothers.
